hero.title: The Old Crown Girton: Historic Thatched Pub & Authentic Nepalese Restaurant
hero.subtitle: Welcome to Girton's unique dining destination, where the largest thatched pub in the country serves exceptional Nepalese cuisine alongside beloved British pub classics.
hero.description: Just minutes from Cambridge and Girton College, we're your family-friendly, dog-welcoming village hub for memorable meals and community gathering.

pressFeature.label: In the press
pressFeature.title: Evening Standard spotlights The Old Crown, Girton
pressFeature.summary: David Ellis praises our welcoming village pub, authentic Nepalese cooking, and ever-evolving menu in the Evening Standard's Country Pub of the Week column.
pressFeature.quote: The changes keep locals coming back.

quickLinks.title: Community & Events
quickLinks.description: Quiz nights, seasonal gatherings & live sports – see what's coming up.

quickLinks.title: Heritage & Story
quickLinks.description: Discover how our thatched village pub evolved into a Nepalese + British hub.

quickLinks.title: Our Menu
quickLinks.description: Authentic Nepalese dishes alongside classic pub favorites.

cta.headline: Ready to Experience Girton's Thatched Nepalese Pub?
cta.description: Reserve a table, explore the menu or plan an event – we'd love to host you.
